rows.label: qst201704_msg0001
rows.name:
Excuse me! Grand Marshal, I have
come to report on the repairs!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, Newt. I'm sorry, but could
you make your report later?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0003
rows.name: ...You seem busy. Is there a problem?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0004
rows.name:
...Yes, actually. Ship-Eating
Taos have made nests on both wings
of the Divine Beast Warship.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0005
rows.name:
We are currently dealing
with the situation...

rows.label: qst201704_msg0006
rows.name: What?! Ship-Eating Taos?!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0007
rows.name:
What are you doing, sirs?!
We must repel the Ship-Eating
Taos immediately!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0008
rows.name: I know... We are not just standing by.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0009
rows.name:
But the monsters are stronger
than expected, and we are
struggling to advance.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0010
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201704_msg0011
rows.name:
Grand Marshal, sir! Permission
to make a suggestion, sir!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0012
rows.name: What is it, Newt?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0013
rows.name:
Would you entrust the
subjugation of these
Ship-Eating Taos to me, Newt?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0014
rows.name: ...You?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0015
rows.name:
However, even for you, fighting
two Ship-Eating Taos...

rows.label: qst201704_msg0016
rows.name:
With every moment that passes,
we don't know what the Ship-Eating
Taos will do next.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0017
rows.name:
In the worst case, the entire
ship could be damaged!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0018
rows.name:
Before that happens, I will
defeat the monsters myself!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0019
rows.name: Wait, Newt!

rows.label: qst201704_msg0020
rows.name:
...Grand Marshal, would you
entrust this matter to us?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0021
rows.name: Meleph-dono... but...

rows.label: qst201704_msg0022
rows.name: It'll be fine.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0023
rows.name: I can guarantee Newt's strength.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0024
rows.name:
Besides, ye have Zeke, the Thunderbolt,
and Meleph, the Flamebringer.

rows.label: qst201704_msg0025
rows.name:
There could be no better subjugation
force than this, right?

rows.label: qst201704_msg0026
rows.name: ...Very well. I'm counting on you.
